room_title: Escape room "The Deadly Inheritance" by Red Herring Escape Rooms in St. Louis
review: I've experienced both rooms and both were great. Brian was extremely helpful, entertaining, and provided a great escape room experience. Five stars!

room_title: Escape room "The Deadly Inheritance" by Red Herring Escape Rooms in St. Louis
review: The best escape room in St Louis. The room was really well done and very challenging.  Highly recommend this place.

room_title: Escape room "The Deadly Inheritance" by Red Herring Escape Rooms in St. Louis
review: We did the Deadly Inheritance room, and it greatly exceeded our expectations! Most of us had done an escape room before, and Red Herring was done much better. Had a great time. Love that there is a TV in the room, where they can give you tiny hints if you want / need them to get you back on track.
